room_title: Escape room "Mission: Mars" by The Escape Game Nashville in Nashville
review: We had an awesome experience here! The staff members were awesome - very fun, helpful, and courteous. The Mission Mars room was a great challenge. We canâ€™t wait to go again!

room_title: Escape room "Mission: Mars" by The Escape Game Nashville in Nashville
review: I absolutely loved this game! The staff was very accommodating and friendly. I played Mission Mars. It was better than I thought it would be. We were a mixed group of 3 smaller groups and we all worked together well to escape. I escaped Mars on my birthday! Must go!

room_title: Escape room "Mission: Mars" by The Escape Game Nashville in Nashville
review: A group of friends and I have played 3 of these rooms with The Escape Game in Nashville. The latest attempted was "Mission Mars" at the E Iris location. The set was very immersive and the puzzle was challenging but beatable.

room_title: Escape room "Mission: Mars" by The Escape Game Nashville in Nashville
review: Three of us visiting from Dallas escaped from Mission Mars. We do escape rooms whenever we travel and this was by far one of the best. Very elaborate set. Lots of game elements. It was a blast!

room_title: Escape room "Mission: Mars" by The Escape Game Nashville in Nashville
review: So far we have only done the Mission: Mars room. It was difficult, not gonna lie, but the room itself was gorgeous! It was fully immersive and I can highly appreciate how much time and effort goes into these rooms. Thank you for the great time and we will be back very soon!!
